Subject: RE: [eqbards] Detail level - Low ...?


Yes, it helps a lot if you are just singing and fighting. I usually zoom
out as far as I can. But of course it isn't going to help if you are
singing, fighting and chasing down mobs in a place like burning woods all
at the same time.

-Steve
